lead_paragraph: German Chancellor Angela Merkel will travel to Washington on March 14 to meet President Donald Trump, their first encounter after a rocky start to relations amid disagreements about trade, Trump’s travel ban and his comments about the media.

headline.main: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO
